text: is a retired long-distance runner from Japan. He represented his native country at the 1988 Summer Olympics.sports-reference His personal bests were 13:46.29 in the 5,000 metres and 28:45.89 in the 10,000 metres, both achieved at the 1987 World Championships. ==Achievements== {| |- |1985 |Asian Championships |Jakarta, Indonesia |bgcolor="gold" | 1st |5,000 m |- |1987 |World Championships |Rome, Italy | 20th |10,000 m |- |1988 |Olympic Games |Seoul, South Korea |14th |10,000 m |} ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male long-distance runners Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Japan Category:Sportspeople from Tochigi Prefecture
title: Kozu Akutsu
